description:
Made with hardend and anodized aluminum, the Alugator Ride 3 guarantees reliability in critical moments. An ergonomically designed T-grip handles ensures a comfortable grip and lets you move snow quickly and efficiently. The straight blade back makes it perfect for creating precise snow profiles.

  • Hardened, anodized aluminum shovel blade
  • Oval telescopic shaft for easy extension and ergonomic grip
  • Automatic spring locking for quick, precise guidance during assembly
  • Ergonomically shaped T-grip for efficient transfer of strength
  • Sharpened, tilt-resistant blade with integrated steps
  • Straight blade is perfect for cutting clean snow profiles
  • Attachment holes for snow anchor and rescue sled
name: Mammut Alugator Ride 3.0 Shovel
